name: Boing (juandalibaba)
description:
This game is a reimplementation made with Unity of the game "boing" from the book "Code the Classics" (https://wireframe.raspberrypi.org/books/code-the-classics1). 

It's a work in progress and I've used it to learn coding videogames with Unity.

The sprites have been designed by Dan Malone and the music by Allister Brimble, two greats names in the videogame word. These assets are release with a creative common license. On the other hand, all the code have been written by myself.

You can play against the machine (one player) or against a mate.

Controls:

  • Player 1: Q -> UP, A -> DOWN
  • Player 2: P -> UP, L -> DOWN

UP and DOWN keys to select mode (one player/two players) and SPACE to enter game.
